displayName.text: キイチロウスポーツ整体 NYC

formattedAddress: 528 E 11th St Apt27, New York, NY 10009, USA
adrFormatAddress: 528 E 11th St Apt27, New York, NY 10009, USA

originalText.text:
He has GOD HAND!! I highly recommended!!
I had really bad active back pain and couldn't get up from a bed. After I got his session pain went away and I could move around and could go back to work next day!!

ギックリ腰になって　動けなかったのに　先生に施術してもらったあと　すぐに動けるようになり　次の日には　仕事に復帰できました。　本当に神業です！！　超おすすめします！！

text.text:
He has GOD HAND!! I highly recommended!!
I had really bad active back pain and couldn't get up from a bed. After I got his session pain went away and I could move around and could go back to work next day!!

I had a stiff back and couldn't move, but after the doctor treated me, I was able to move right away and was able to return to work the next day. It's truly a miracle! ! Highly recommended! !

originalText.text:
オフィスワークで一日中パソコン仕事によるひどい肩こりに悩まされてされていました。ニューヨークで日本人のマッサージの方を探したところキイチロウマッサージを見つけました。

週一で施術してもらっています。
今では日常で肩こりを認識することが少なくなり、
以前はやっていた、話しながら無意識に肩に手を当てて温める事もなくなりました。

仕事のパフォーマンスも上がり、今では彼のマッサージなしでは過ごせなくなりました。

I have stiff shoulder due to my work. I get his massage every week. I can't live without him. that's too bad.

text.text:
I was suffering from severe shoulder stiffness due to working at the office all day on the computer. When I was looking for a Japanese massager in New York, I found Kiichiro Massage.

I have the treatment done once a week.
Nowadays, I am less aware of stiff shoulders in my daily life.
I no longer unconsciously put my hand on someone's shoulder to warm them while talking, which I used to do before.

My work performance has improved, and now I can't go without a massage from him.

I have stiff shoulder due to my work. I get his massage every week. I can't live without him. that's too bad.

originalText.text: 職業柄ずっと腰痛があったので、友人に紹介されたキイチロウさんに腰痛のマッサージをお願いしました。キイチロウさんはとても勉強家で、人の体に付いている骨や筋肉の位置やつながりについての知識がすごいです。ただ強く闇雲にするマッサージでは無く、論理的にどことどこのつながりがあってこういう原因があるので痛みが出ています、など、説明をしながらマッサージしてくれるので、こちらもわかりやすく納得出来て満足度もとても高いです。急性の腰痛にも効果があり、マッサージしてもらってその場で痛みが消えた時は驚きました。オススメです！

text.text: I have always had back pain due to my job, so I asked Mr. Kiichiro, who was introduced to me by a friend, to give me a massage for my back pain. Mr. Kiichiro is very studious and has amazing knowledge about the positions and connections of bones and muscles in the human body. It's not just a strong and vague massage, but the massage is explained to me in a way that is easy to understand and understand, such as the logical connection between where and where, and the cause of the pain, etc. Satisfaction level is also very high. It is also effective for acute lower back pain, and I was surprised when I received a massage and the pain disappeared on the spot. Recommended!

originalText.text:
旅行中に、ホテルに来ていただいて友達と一緒にマッサージをしていただきました。
(11月のニューヨークに4泊の旅行で、飛行機での疲労と、長距離歩いた疲労が溜まってました)

技術はもちろんですが、とても優しく、感じがいい方で、安心して施術を受けることができました。

スポーツをやられている方に限らず、ニューヨークに旅行で来られた方にもオススメです。

text.text:
During my trip, I had a friend come to my hotel and give me a massage.
(I was on a 4-night trip to New York in November, and I was tired from flying and walking long distances.)

Not only is he technically skilled, but he is also very kind and personable, so I was able to receive the treatment with peace of mind.

Recommended not only for those who are involved in sports, but also for those who are traveling to New York.

originalText.text:
あまり言いたく無かったのですが
寒いこの季節、お困りの方が多いのでレビューを書くことにしました
私は野球選手が良く行う、肩の靭帯再生手術を数年前に行いました その後は肩の違和感と寒さによはり痛みと付き合いながら数年間、生活を送っていたところ彼を紹介されて施術を受けたところ噓みたいに痛みがなくなり 普通の生活をおくれるようになりました 肩が痛いのに別の箇所をマッサージされたり 少し心配なところもあったのですが彼の理論を聞いて納得することばかりでした この季節、古傷が痛む方がいらっしゃったら是非一度試したらと思います

text.text:
I didn't want to say much.
I decided to write a review because many people are having trouble during this cold season.
A few years ago, I had shoulder ligament regeneration surgery, which is often done by baseball players.After that, I lived for several years with discomfort and pain in my shoulder due to cold weather, and then I was introduced to him and had the surgery done. When I received the treatment, the pain went away and I was able to live a normal life.Even though my shoulder was hurting, he massaged another area, so I was a little worried, but after hearing his theory, I was convinced. There was just so much to do.If you are suffering from old injuries this season, I think you should try it at least once.
